CustomField.formula: IF(CONTAINS($Api.Partner_Server_URL_290, "Edison"), HYPERLINK("/Edison/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file="+ VG_Attachment__c , "View Attachment"), IF(CONTAINS($Api.Partner_Server_URL_290, "Bridge"), HYPERLINK("/Bridge/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file="+ VG_Attachment__c , "View Attachment"), IF(CONTAINS($Api.Partner_Server_URL_290, "LS"), HYPERLINK("/LS/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file="+ VG_Attachment__c , "View Attachment"), "")))
CustomField.label: View
